entry.title: HEAT WARNING, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 a.m. MDT Wednesday 3 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 29.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low 15.
